name: api-test-automation-postman-newman
description: API Test Automation Framework using Postman and Newman
author: Priyanka Arora

scripts.test:all: npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- sh -c 'npm run test:users && npm run test:posts && npm run test:e2e && npm run test:negative'
scripts.test:smoke: npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- sh -c 'npx newman run collections/GoRest_UserManagement.postman_collection.json -e environments/LOCAL.postman_environment.json --env-var "authToken=$GOREST_AUTH_TOKEN" --env-var "api-key=$REQRES_API_KEY" --folder "Smoke Tests" -r cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/smoke-test-report.html'
scripts.test:users: npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- sh -c 'npx newman run collections/GoRest_UserManagement.postman_collection.json -e environments/LOCAL.postman_environment.json --env-var "authToken=$GOREST_AUTH_TOKEN" --env-var "api-key=$REQRES_API_KEY" -r cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/users-report.html'
scripts.test:posts: npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- sh -c 'npx newman run collections/GoRest_PostsAndComments.postman_collection.json -e environments/LOCAL.postman_environment.json --env-var "authToken=$GOREST_AUTH_TOKEN" --env-var "api-key=$REQRES_API_KEY" -r cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/posts-report.html'
scripts.test:e2e: npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- sh -c 'npx newman run collections/E2E_UserJourney.postman_collection.json -e environments/LOCAL.postman_environment.json --env-var "authToken=$GOREST_AUTH_TOKEN" --env-var "api-key=$REQRES_API_KEY" -r cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/e2e-report.html'
scripts.test:negative: npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- sh -c 'npx newman run collections/NegativeScenarios.postman_collection.json -e environments/LOCAL.postman_environment.json --env-var "authToken=$GOREST_AUTH_TOKEN" --env-var "api-key=$REQRES_API_KEY" -r cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/negative-report.html'
scripts.test:data-driven: npx dotenv-cli -e .env -- sh -c 'npx newman run collections/GoRest_UserManagement.postman_collection.json -e environments/LOCAL.postman_environment.json --env-var "authToken=$GOREST_AUTH_TOKEN" --env-var "api-key=$REQRES_API_KEY" -d data/test-data.csv -r cli,htmlextra --reporter-htmlextra-export reports/data-driven-report.html'
